name: triopsi-block-visibility
description: Example block scaffolded with Create Block tool.
author: The WordPress Contributors

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:editor && npm run build:styles
scripts.dev: npm run dev:editor & npm run dev:styles
scripts.plugin-zip: mkdir -p release && rsync -av --delete --exclude-from=".distignore" ./ release/triopsi-block-visibility/ && cd release && zip -r triopsi-block-visibility.zip triopsi-block-visibility && cd ..
